data:
Name: Prevent-IA

Idea: Prevent-IA is an innovative and proactive education platform designed to empower workers by providing them with comprehensive training and resources on Occupational Risk Prevention. Leveraging the power of artificial intelligence, Prevent-IA offers personalized learning experiences, real-time risk assessments, and interactive simulations to enhance understanding and retention. The platform targets a wide range of industries and workers, ensuring a safer and healthier work environment for everyone. By fostering a culture of safety and prevention, Prevent-IA contributes to reducing workplace accidents and promoting overall well-being.
